Auto Folding/Unfolding

In order to improve SQL readability, MinBatis auto folds SQL statement in Java annotation when it loses focus and a SQL statement is unfolded when it get focused again to make it easy for editing. Focus here means that the caret is placed on a SQL statement.

Auto-unfolding is made 500ms delayed when a SQL statement get focused in order to avoid unexpected unfolding when we move caret by keyboard narrows quickly.

Let’s see what it looks like:
